channel.title: How to make knob output a binary value?
channel.description: Hi, just beginning to mess around with Axoloti, and I want to use an endless encoder (on a Novation Circuit) to select a bank of 2 (bank A or bank B). I was hoping to have a small travel on the encoders to select the bank, so I was thinking of detecting a positive delta or negative delta on the encoder value, but connecting a dial to a filter/delta to a disp doesn't really work, and the Help doc on filter/delta doesn't really help. Any suggestions to achieve this?

item.title: How to make knob output a binary value?
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

there is also a > c object, where you can simply set the pot position with a dial.

Read full topic

Hi, just beginning to mess around with Axoloti, and I want to use an endless encoder (on a Novation Circuit) to select a bank of 2 (bank A or bank B). I was hoping to have a small travel on the encoders to select the bank, so I was thinking of detecting a positive delta or negative delta on the encoder value, but connecting a dial to a filter/delta to a disp doesn't really work, and the Help doc on filter/delta doesn't really help. Any suggestions to achieve this?
